body: Gathlains are defined by their class levels—they don't have racial Hit Dice. All gathlains have the following racial traits.
name: Gathlain

sections.body: Gathlains are quick, with dynamic and engaging personalities, but are rather fragile.
sections.name: +2 Dexterity, –2 Constitution, +2 Charisma

sections.body: Gathlains are Small and gain a +1 size bonus on attack rolls, a -1 penalty on combat maneuver checks and to CMD, a +2 bonus on Fly checks, and a +4 size bonus on Stealth checks.
sections.name: Small

sections.body: Gathlains have a base speed of 30 feet and a fly speed of 40 feet (poor).
sections.name: Normal Speed

sections.body: Gathlains can see twice as far as humans in dim light.
sections.name: Low-Light Vision

sections.body: 1/day—entangle, feather step (caster level equals the gathlain's character level).
sections.name: Spell-Like Abilities

sections.body: Gathlains speak Common and Sylvan. A gathlain with a high Intelligence score can choose from the following languages: Draconic, Elven, Goblin, Halfling, and Orc.
sections.name: Languages
